Description: Length of narrow ribbon or tape in warp-faced plain weave linen; undyed and red linen, threads of the two colours arranged alternately producing a barred pattern; warp order: 2 single threads unbleached linen, 4 pairs bleached linen, 4 singles red linen, arranged alternatively, 2 single unbleached threads; warp-linen (S/12 singles or paird ends in 8mm), weft-linen (S/c.4); two simple selvedges, end frayed; probably used to tie shrouds of a post-mummification type burial
Curator's comments: Unreg. 90; previously in grey plan chest in Student's Room; similar to unreg. 21
